## ExecutionContextSetup.setRequestId() method

Attaches provided "requestId" as identifier of the current request. Should be a valid uuid.v4 value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setRequestId(requestId: string): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  requestId | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
